meanings.definition: In a manner that does not reflect reality or likelihood.
meanings.sent1: She unrealistically believed she could fly like a superhero.
meanings.sent2: He unrealistically expected to win the lottery without buying a ticket.
meanings.sent3: The cat unrealistically thought it could catch the laser dot on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of becoming a mermaid were unrealistically far-fetched.
meanings.sent5: The idea of time travel seemed unrealistically impossible to the young scientist.

meanings.definition: In a way that is not based on practicality or reason.
meanings.sent1: He unrealistically decided to quit his job without having another one lined up.
meanings.sent2: She unrealistically believed she could finish all her homework in five minutes.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel unrealistically tried to carry the entire bag of nuts up the tree.
meanings.sent4: His plan to build a spaceship in his backyard was unrealistically ambitious.
meanings.sent5: The idea of living on Mars seemed unrealistically exciting to the young astronaut.
